Operating System Support: Windows  OS X  Unixlike  Morph OS
Description: Has a builtin tracker and announcement service
Uses Mono or NET Core for crossplatform support (NET)

IPv6: yes (IPv4 and IPv6 have separate binaries and processes that do not share any information between them If a client communicates to the tracker over IPv6  it will only receive IPv6 addresses in the response)
Description: Uses libowfat [4] performs well even on embedded hardware Only requirement is a POSIX compliant OS Supports only a compact peer list
Extremely lightweight and efficient BitTorrent tracker Supports SQLite3  and MySQL for storage
Does not have a list of hosted torrents
Lightweight Supports DHT  PEX  announcements via UDP Does not have a web interface or list of hosted torrents; it is not designed for secure or largescale application
Vuze (formerly Azureus) has a built in tracker
Uses MySQL for data storage  lightweight tracker
A lightweight tracker that does not require any external database support
